document_data.caption: A warrior woman wielding a sword that looks a lot like Scale Cleaver.
document_data.name: ''Scale Cleaver''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Scale Cleaver''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[sword]] originating in [[Chult]].{{Cite polyhedron/76/Babette|6}}
document_data.Description: A very well-forged [[long sword]], it was adorned with intertwining symbols from the language of its elven creators, which told of its origin and purpose.If these elves are assumed to speak [[Elven language|Elven]], then these symbols are likely some form of Espruar.
document_data.History: This sword was crafted by a rare [[elf|elven people]] living in marshes within the jungles of Chult in order to aid them in their age-old battles against the [[lizard men]].
document_data.Powers: Normally a ''+1 long sword'', it became more powerful, rising to ''+5'', against all foes covered in natural scalesâ€”not only lizardfolk, but also [[lizard]]s, [[snake]]s, [[fish]], and [[dragon]]s, and even those wearing armor made of natural scales.
